If you do not wish to agree our updated terms of service and Privacy Policy, you will need to discontinue using the Alpha 1E robot, the Alpha 1E App and other UBTECH robots or services related to your account. Your account will be deregisted. And all related content and settings cannot be restored, retrieved or recovered once they are erased.

Please enter “123456” below to submit the request.
Important Notice of Request Alpha1E Account Cancellation

Alpha1E Account Cancellation is an unrecoverable operation. Back up related information from your account before proceeding. Please note: The information associated with the account scheduled for delete cannot be restored, retrieved, or recovered once it is deleted. The information affected include, but are not limited to: (1) You're unable to log in to or use Alpha1E or other robots produced by UBTECH. (2) Deletion of your profile information cannot be reverted. (3) Deletion of your action and programming works cannot be reverted. (4) Deletion of your your post and profile in the Alpha1E community cannot be reverted.
Are you sure you want to submit Account Cancellation?
Please make sure you have read the Important Notice before submitting the request. All related content and settings cannot be restored, retrieved or recovered once they are erased.
